details.title: Aircraft maintenance jacking problem via optimization
details.abstract: We address the problem of assigning forces to jacking positions in order to weaken stress at points where an aircraft maintenance operation has to be performed. We introduce a mixed-integer linear programming model and report encouraging computational experiments on historical data. Our methodology is currently under the process of industrial implementation at Airbus, where it will be used as a maintenance decision-analysis tool.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
